Get basic country data

Source: R/country_metadata.R
country_metadata.Rd

This function uses the rest api here https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/all' to get country metadata.

country_metadata()

Value

a data.frame

See also

https://restcountries.eu/rest/v2/all

Author

Sean Davis seandavi@gmail.com

Examples

cmd = country_metadata()
colnames(cmd)

#>  [1] "name"           "topLevelDomain" "alpha2Code"     "alpha3Code"    
#>  [5] "callingCodes"   "capital"        "altSpellings"   "region"        
#>  [9] "subregion"      "population"     "latlng"         "demonym"       
#> [13] "area"           "gini"           "timezones"      "borders"       
#> [17] "nativeName"     "numericCode"    "currencies"     "languages"     
#> [21] "translations"   "flag"           "regionalBlocs"  "cioc"          
sapply(cmd, class)

#>           name topLevelDomain     alpha2Code     alpha3Code   callingCodes 
#>    "character"         "list"    "character"    "character"         "list" 
#>        capital   altSpellings         region      subregion     population 
#>    "character"         "list"    "character"    "character"      "integer" 
#>         latlng        demonym           area           gini      timezones 
#>         "list"    "character"      "numeric"      "numeric"         "list" 
#>        borders     nativeName    numericCode     currencies      languages 
#>         "list"    "character"    "character"         "list"         "list" 
#>   translations           flag  regionalBlocs           cioc 
#>   "data.frame"    "character"         "list"    "character" 

head(cmd)

#> # A tibble: 6 × 24
#>   name           topLevelDomain alpha2Code alpha3Code callingCodes capital altSpellings
#>   <chr>          <list>         <chr>      <chr>      <list>       <chr>   <list>      
#> 1 Afghanistan    <chr [1]>      AF         AFG        <chr [1]>    Kabul   <chr [2]>   
#> 2 Åland Islands  <chr [1]>      AX         ALA        <chr [1]>    Marieh… <chr [4]>   
#> 3 Albania        <chr [1]>      AL         ALB        <chr [1]>    Tirana  <chr [4]>   
#> 4 Algeria        <chr [1]>      DZ         DZA        <chr [1]>    Algiers <chr [3]>   
#> 5 American Samoa <chr [1]>      AS         ASM        <chr [1]>    Pago P… <chr [4]>   
#> 6 Andorra        <chr [1]>      AD         AND        <chr [1]>    Andorr… <chr [3]>   
#> # … with 17 more variables: region <chr>, subregion <chr>, population <int>,
#> #   latlng <list>, demonym <chr>, area <dbl>, gini <dbl>, timezones <list>,
#> #   borders <list>, nativeName <chr>, numericCode <chr>, currencies <list>,
#> #   languages <list>, translations <df[,10]>, flag <chr>, regionalBlocs <list>,
#> #   cioc <chr>
